metadata.name: NYI New Era Deluxe Package #1
metadata.description: This is a tribute to the long-awaited return of the New York Islanders to Long Island. Beginning with a captivating display of never-before-seen 3D graphics of the UBS Arena, the excitement builds as the biscuit drops, the ice shatters, and the Islanders break away for their first clapper in their new arena, culminating in a thrilling celebration of one of the best teams in hockey. It's a must-have for Islanders fans and hockey enthusiasts who want to own a piece of history and commemorate this momentous occasion in the team's legacy. This NFT came with real-life utility to the original minter.
